segments.text: May I have your order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we'd have your regular dinner . What courses are there , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The courses for our regular dinner are , appetizer , soup , beef steak , dessert and coffee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of dessert do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have some chocolate cakes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait for a moment , I'll come back soon .
segments.speaker: S1
